lines.text: [Parnell tries to convince Mrs. O'Shea of his love]
Have you never felt there might be someone, somewhere who, if you could meet them, was the person that you'd been always meant to meet? Have you never felt that?
Ours could be a great love story, Katie.
Great love stories are always unhappy ones.
Then I hope ours *won't* be great.
[while visiting America, Parnell gives some money to a poor family]
It's little wonder why they call him the King of Ireland.
He'll get his crown in heaven.
